titleStmt.title: The death of Robert, Earle of Huntington Otherwise called Robin Hood of merrie Sherwodde: with the lamentable tragedie of chaste Matilda, his faire maid Marian, poysoned at Dunmowe by King Iohn. Acted by the Right Honourable, the Earle of Notingham, Lord high Admirall of England, his seruants.
titleStmt.author: Munday, Anthony, 1553-1633.
Henry, Chettle, d. 1607?. aut

notesStmt.note: By Anthony Munday and Henry Chettle.
Probably issued with their "The downfall of Robert, Earle of Huntington" (STC 18271).
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
